gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 135, Kings 123
gameRecap.excerpt: New Orleans defeats Sacramento, 135-123. For New Orleans, CJ McCollum led the way with 31 points (nine 3PM) and seven assists while aided by Zion Williamson (31 points, six assists, three steals) and Trey Murphy III (27 points (six 3PM), five rebounds) in the victory. De'Aaron Fox finished with 33 points, five rebounds, and eight assists with Harrison Barnes adding 22 points and five rebounds for Sacramento in the losing effort. New Orleans improves to 48-32, while Sacramento moves to 45-35 with the loss.
